oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Idlewild East - Floor Plan and Elevation
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: apartments; architecture; buildings; Idlewild Street; Union Avenue;
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: First floor plan and rendering of "Idlewild East," designed for 1787 Union and commissioned by Arthur Seelbinder. The companion property, "Idlewild West," was planned for 1775 Union.
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: McGown, Daniel T. (architect); Hunt, John W. (associate);
oai_dc:dc.dc:contributor: Gift of Josh Whitehead (Secretary, Board of Adjustment)
oai_dc:dc.dc:coverage: Memphis and Shelby County Board of Adjustment
